play.mvc
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  play.mvc.Results
      play.mvc.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
Http.HeaderNames, Http.Status
public abstract class Controller
extends Results
implements Http.Status, Http.HeaderNames

Superclass for a Java-based controller.
